name: Toyent
body:
### Welcome to [toyent](toyent.com)
This is a static page host in [github](github.com) pages. [toyent](toyent.com) is nothing but a toy entertainment. [toyent](toyent.com) has a vary toy productions under research now, and not in public in the recent years.

### Designer Templates
We’ve crafted some handsome templates for you to use. Go ahead and click 'Continue to layouts' to browse through them. You can easily go back to edit your page before publishing. After publishing your page, you can revisit the page generator and switch to another theme. Your Page content will be preserved.

### Support or Contact
Having ideas or problems? Please contact of of the cooperator [buf1024](luoguochun.cn) or [support](450171094@qq.com) and we’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
